acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused person is present. Judgment is pronounced in open court in presence of accused person. Accused person is acquitted from the charges labelled against him. I also released the accused person from the liability of bail bond and set him at liberty.Judgment is written in separate sheet attached with CR.
